Also I learned that every time leftist politicians propose or pass laws that promise “free stuff” like free college & healthcare (like the CA Medi-Cal bill) border crossings actually SPIKE. Unlike Christy Smith I’m committed to border security & putting America’s needs first.
Wherever the triple-layered fence has been built drug traffic has dropped to ZERO. THIS NEEDS TO BE FULLY FUNDED AND COMPLETED ACROSS THE ENTIRE BORDER!

I was surprised to learn that there are 4 different types of “walls” within a few miles of the border. Old structures are ineffective. But I was encouraged to see the new 3 layer system making good progress: This section of the border has yet to be penetrated with the new system.

(Important Thread!)While Christy Smith stood by and refused to vote against a bill that gave Medi-Cal benefits to illegal immigrants I decided to visit the US Mexico border and border facilities near Yuma Arizona! @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/qNtaFFt2l7

Tomorrow we as a community have the opportunity to show the country and the world that what unites us is infinitely stronger than what divides us. The vigil will allow this city to mourn and come together as one and to honor the lives of the victims of this terrible tragedy.
I am continuing to pray for those affected and for the Saugus family as a whole. Tomorrow I invite you to attend the citywide vigil that will be held at Central Park’s Flagpole from 7 P.M. to 10 P.M.

My high school home has been heavy on my mind. It has brought back many memories of my time within those walls and I am heartbroken that this place that meant so much to me is now the site of such unspeakable tragedy.
I am continuing to pray for those affected and for the Saugus family as a whole I invite you to attend the citywide vigil that will be held tomorrow at Central Park’s Flagpole from 7 P.M. to 10 P.M.
